Detailed Description

template<>
struct boost::gil::default_color_converter_impl< rgb_t, cmyk_t >

RGB to CMYK (not the fastest code in the world)

k = min(1 - r, 1 - g, 1 - b) c = (1 - r - k) / (1 - k) m = (1 - g - k) / (1 - k) y = (1 - b - k) / (1 - k)
